oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "New bridge on Newfound Gap Highway at the Chimneys campground before the road was finished. The clearing near the other end of the bridge is where the campground is now."
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph taken with a 3A Autographic Kodak folding camera.
